name: Virus Run (Surveillance)
description:
Simple rules in short:

W jump

AD left and right

P defence

R restart

Left-click shoot (only available in several game scenes)

You are a poliovirus. Your task is to defeat the immune system and invade the body.

This is a 2D pixel adventurous video game. The player controls the virus “Polio” to overcome the difficulties from the immune system. This game aims to explore the human immune system from the perspective of a virus, in order to educate and entertain players about the immune system.
